title: 302: Will Alvin Kamara, Kareem Hunt dominate again in 2018?
itunes:title: 302: Will Alvin Kamara, Kareem Hunt dominate again in 2018?
description:
Can Andrew Luck bounce back? Daniel Jeremiah and Bucky Brooks break down the Colts signal caller after news broke he was back throwing again (3:13). The guys also debate which franchise has the best wide receiving corps following Josh Gordon's comments claiming the Browns held the top spot (8:52). DJ and Bucky then reveal their expectations for Alvin Kamara, Christian McCaffery, and the rest of the 2nd-year running backs (22:15). Interviews with UCF QB McKenzie Milton & Missouri QB Drew Lock round out a packed episode (40:12).

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
